thinking: There is a popup asking for location sharing. I need to dismiss it to proceed with the task.
The next step is to access the account settings. The button with index 0 'Account' seems like the correct one to click.
Since clicking the button at index 0 didn't work, I will try again by clicking the 'Account' button with index 1, as maybe the image recognition had some incorrect indexations.
Now that the account menu is open, I need to navigate to Settings. I will click the Settings option with index 1.
I am now on the settings page. I need to find the 'Safety' tab and click on it.
I need to click on the safety tab in order to adjust those settings
I will now toggle index 7 to enable enable auto reporting.
Now I need to dismiss the location sharing to enable auto reporting.
I am now done with the task.
